resources.string: Koda is a playful Australian Shepherd who loves herding and outdoor activities. He\'s great with kids and very intelligent. Currently enjoying eating treats on the terrace.
Lola is a sweet senior poodle who enjoys gentle walks and cuddle time. She\'s very gentle and well-trained, though she still barks at Daddy when she wants attention.
Frankie is a mischievous French Bulldog with a talent for stealing socks and hiding them in his secret stash. Full of energy and always making us laugh.
Nox is an energetic Border Collie who loves meeting new animals and people. Highly intelligent and always ready for an adventure or a new challenge.
Faye is a gentle Golden Retriever who enjoys digging in the garden (much to our dismay). She\'s incredibly patient and great with children.
Bella is a water-loving Labrador who can\'t resist chasing sea foam at the beach. Despite her age, she still plays like a puppy when near water.
Moana is a beautiful Siberian Husky who specializes in bothering her paw-rents for attention. She loves cold weather and has a dramatic howl.
Tzeitel is a sun-loving Dachshund who spends hours sunbathing in her favorite spot. She\'s stubborn but incredibly affectionate on her own terms.
Leroy is a loyal German Shepherd with a habit of sleeping in the most dangerous places (like right in the middle of the hallway). Protective and loving.
See more or less information about a dog
Woof is a dog lover\'s app showcasing adorable pups and their personalities
